name: Relic Rides - Fares of Tempus
description:
Relic Rides - Fares of Tempus

Relic Rides is a game that was inspired by the retro game Crazy Taxi by Sega. Instead of a car and a town Relic Rides was a game set in the past with a chariot as you source of transportation.

Fares of tempus is  inspired by Relic Rides original idea and adding switching mechanics of Overcooked.

Navigate the chariots to pick up locations and deliver required passenger to the location as quickly as possible -  the fare for delivery reduces the moment you pick the passenger up so there is no time to waste!

Switch chariot to help with delivering the passenger on time

Controls

WASD/Arrow keys - move chariot

Spacebar - pick up/drop off

X - Switch Chariots
